show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #59 Sean Faulkner "Being Observant of Change"
subtitle: #59 Sean Faulkner "Being Observant of Change"
summary:
My friend and long time Red Hills Rancher fan Sean Faulkner made the trip down to the Red Hills to see my cows and ranch first hand. After touring around for several hours and checking in on my beaver ponds, we headed to the Eastes Media Studio to wrap up our day.
